articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The chief executive of the company which felled an ancient oak apologises and opens a review.
articles.title: Toby Carvery owner 'sorry' for felling ancient Enfield tree

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Public bodies will have to review policies after the Supreme Court's ruling a woman is based on biological sex.
articles.title: Equalities watchdog to issue new guidelines on gender after ruling

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The showrunner says he has "no time" for complaints about diversity from "online warriors".
articles.title: Doctor Who boss Russell T Davies hits back at 'wokeness' criticisms

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Scientists find new but tentative evidence that a faraway world orbiting another star may be home to life.
articles.title: Promising hints of life found on distant planet K2-18b

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The pair hope to take a step towards release - decades after killing their parents in a high-profile US case.
articles.title: Erik and Lyle Menendez resentencing hearing to begin in Los Angeles

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: People coming into Great Britain can no longer bring cured meats or cheese from the EU following an outbreak of foot-and-mouth disease.
articles.title: UK bans EU cheese and meat imports to prevent disease spreading

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Donald Trump has repeatedly said he wants to broker a swift end to the ongoing conflict.
articles.title: Ukraine war: US to hold talks in Paris with Europeans

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: GPs will work more closely with specialists to support patients closer to home, the government says.
articles.title: Plan for GPs to keep millions of patients out of hospital

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Dentists say it was a "great privilege" to treat the rare animal at Chester Zoo.
articles.title: Chester Zoo sloth has dental surgery to cure toothache

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Impressionists say exaggeration is part of the job, but some warn that jokes shouldn't punch down.
articles.title: Aimee Lou Wood: Comedians weigh in on Saturday Night Live skit
